channel.title: Drawing the ____
channel.description:
Hopefully the title throws you off but this thread is just an opportunity for the community to provide feedback on what they would like to see. Just do keep in mind that we are aiming to provide a RSC F2P replica. So changes won't be extreme but there are some things that possibly can altered if the community agrees..
[b]A) Player Quests[/b] The exp rate of the server is 4x but what if quests had a reward multiplier as well (being 4x). Below is a list of the f2p quests with their rewards and multipler.
[size=8pt] Black Knight's Fortress (2500gp) [b]->[/b] (10,000) Cook's Assistant (270 Cooking exp) [b]->[/b] (1,080 Cooking exp) Demon Slayer (irrelevant reward) Doric's Quest (1,300 Mining exp) [b]->[/b] (5,200 Mining exp) Dragon slayer (19,250 Defence exp) [b]->[/b] (77,000 Defence exp) (20,000 Str exp) [b]->[/b] (80,000 Str exp) Ernest the Chicken (300gp) [b]->[/b] (1,200gp) Goblin Diplomacy (200 - 620 Crafting exp) [b]->[/b] (800 - 2480 Crafting exp) Imp Catcher (875 Magic exp) -> (3500 Magic exp) The Knight's Sword ([url=http://runescapeclassic.wikia.com/wiki/The_Knight%27s_Sword#Rewards]Smithing exp based on level[/url]) [b]->[/b] 4x that Pirate's Treasure (450gp) [b]->[/b] (1800gp) Prince Ali Rescue (700gp) [b]->[/b] (2800gp) The Restless Ghost (1,125 Prayer exp) [b]->[/b] (4,500 Prayer exp) Romeo & Juliet (irrelevant) Sheep Shearer (180 craft exp)[b] ->[/b] (720 craft exp) Shield of Arrav (600gp) [b]->[/b] (2400gp) Vampire Slayer (4,825 Attack exp) [b]->[/b] (19300 Attack exp) Witch's potion (Magic exp : 225 + 50 * level) [b]->[/b] (*4) [/size]
I personally feel that they all are fine with a 4x multiplier except dragon slayer. Should maybe be 2x?
[b]B) Dieing in the wild.[/b]
This is my own opinion but instead of being taken to lumbridge after you die (in the wild) we should do what we can to influence pking at varrock border. I made a commit to github with this feature when can be enabled/disabled via the config file. I have talked to a few different people about it and I would like to see what you guys think.
[code] /** * If a player dies in wild they will be sent to varrock. This is * because nobody can be fudgeed to walk all the way back and is in attempt * to bring back varrock wild pking (which no server has ever done) */ if(location.inWilderness() && Config.VARROCKSPAWN) { setLocation(Point.location(122, 509), true); } else { //lumbridge setLocation(Point.location(122, 647), true); }[/code]
[b]C) Certing all certs at same time.[/b] Thoughts?

item.title: Drawing the ____
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“All Day, post:176, topic:530087”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=648844.msg4391771#msg4391771 date=1387779343]
Adios Amigo

I wait in patience.
[/quote]

Rodger what exactly are you waiting for? At first it was a client(?) and now it seems as if Moparisthebest is waiting on [B]YOU[/B]. So what is going on? You have your own subforum for fudges sake and you’re just wasting everyone’s time.

You’ve been ‘waiting’ for months while in reality we’re the only ones waiting. You’re making a fudgeing RuneScape Classic private server that maybe 50 people will play. Quit acting like you’re doing something so intense that is requires you months upon months to make one decision, let alone get some development going.

This project has flopped because of poor communication, the lack of ability you and the rest of the people behind Moparclassic have to work individually on this project because for some reason no of you have access to shit.

You’ve let me down, and a majority of the people who were looking forward to this server down.

I really hope you don’t delete this post like you have with some of the my other replies, but instead I hope you give me and the rest of us an actual reply and not some cringe-worthy one sentence reply about how elite you and your team are when you have nothing to show for it.[/quote]

I played RSC once or twice but never made much of it, and I also played a few servers but never really enjoyed them. I hoped that I would be able to play MoparClassic although it’s beginning to look like that won’t happen unfortunately. I’m sure there are enough people with development skills to be able to help out the team (if they asked for help I’m sure I could take a look over the code and give them a hand on some of the smaller problems) but they seem to be spending time on stupid features such as Reddit authentication.

Read full topic

Rodger what exactly are you waiting for? At first it was a client(?) and now it seems as if Moparisthebest is waiting on [B]YOU[/B]. So what is going on? You have your own subforum for fudges sake and you’re just wasting everyone’s time.

You’ve been ‘waiting’ for months while in reality we’re the only ones waiting. You’re making a fudgeing RuneScape Classic private server that maybe 50 people will play. Quit acting like you’re doing something so intense that is requires you months upon months to make one decision, let alone get some development going.

You’ve let me down, and a majority of the people who were looking forward to this server down.

I really hope you don’t delete this post like you have with some of the my other replies, but instead I hope you give me and the rest of us an actual reply and not some cringe-worthy one sentence reply about how elite you and your team are when you have nothing to show for it.

I mean, seriously…if you’re not actively trying to get this together and keep us together, what’s the point in the project. I’d prefer if you guys officially quit this project, rather than putting it on a long hiatus, so I can stop checking in.
